item.description:
There is still some snow and ice on the trails and it is going to be in the 40's

This Ride will be re-scheduled




Hi All,

This will be a great first ride of the season. There are many trails at MSP and it is along the Mighty Merrimac with beautiful views. Afterwards we could head downtown for some food and cheer.

3pm meeting at the park.

Facilities bathrooms.
item.why: This will be a great first ride of the season. There are many trails at MSP and it is along the Mighty Merrimac with beautiful views. Afterwards we could head downtown for some food and cheer.
item.name: Feel'in Spring in the Air Ride -POSTPONED
